content.title: Frequently Asked Questions
content.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Chitti

faqs.question: What is Chitti and how does it work?
faqs.answer: Chitti is an AI-powered workflow automation platform that helps teams streamline their processes. It uses machine learning to understand your workflows, identify automation opportunities, and execute tasks automatically, saving you time and reducing errors.

faqs.question: How long does it take to set up Chitti?
faqs.answer: Setup is quick and easy! Most teams are fully operational within 30 minutes. Our intuitive onboarding process guides you through connecting your tools and configuring your first automated workflows.

faqs.question: Which tools and platforms does Chitti integrate with?
faqs.answer: Chitti integrates with over 100+ popular tools including Slack, Microsoft Teams, Google Workspace, Salesforce, Jira, Asana, Trello, and many more. We're constantly adding new integrations based on customer needs.

faqs.question: Is my data secure with Chitti?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption for all data transmission and storage. Chitti is SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant, and we never store your sensitive credentials. Your data is yours and yours alone.

faqs.question: Can I customize workflows for my specific needs?
faqs.answer: Yes! Chitti offers highly customizable workflows. You can create custom automation rules, set conditional logic, and build multi-step workflows that match your unique business processes. No coding required.

faqs.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faqs.answer: We provide 24/7 email support, live chat during business hours, and a comprehensive knowledge base. Premium plans include dedicated account managers and priority support with guaranteed response times.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial available?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required. After the trial, you can choose the plan that best fits your needs or continue with our free tier.

faqs.question: How does Chitti pricing work?
faqs.answer: We offer flexible pricing based on your team size and automation needs. Plans start with a free tier for small teams, with paid plans offering advanced features, higher limits, and priority support. Contact our sales team for enterprise pricing.

contactCta.text: Still have questions? We're here to help!
